title: Crowd diversity
content: I would want to know an approximate percentage of hosteliers/north Indians joining in pesu btech cse. Also the sex ratio. No offense to anyone just wanna know....

comments.body: Why don't you wait for a few days? You will find it out for yourself.

Why do you want to know the number of North Indians 
Do you intend to make friends with only them?
And sex ratio? You are a creep
